message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price given the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I can't sell this product for less than its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000.  This offer reflects the unique benefits this product offers and the return on investment you'll see.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $750,000 is a more reasonable price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $825,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
